00091 #  define UString string
00092 
00093 #       define U_STR_RESERVE(str,len)           (str).resize(len)
00094 #       define U_STR_SIZE_ADJUST(str,len)       (str).resize(len)
00095 #       define U_STR_SIZE_ADJUST_FORCE(str,len) (str).resize(len)
00096 #       define U_STR_ASSIGN_MMAP(str,map,size)  (str)->reserve(size); (str)->assign(map,size)
